actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend eligibility for automobile adaptive equipment to certain additional veterans.

summary.text: Provides that any veteran receiving compensation for the permanent incomplete use of an arm or a leg, which resulted from any injury incurred or disease contracted in or aggravated by active military, naval, or air service during World War II or thereafter, shall receive such adaptive equipment as is necessary to insure that he will be able to operate an automobile in a manner consistent with his own safety and the safety of others.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend eligibility for automobile adaptive equipment to certain additional veterans.
